raw_comment:
I notice that the both basketball associations have the most players of colour. I notice that Major League Baseball is lacking in both player of colour and head coaches of colour. I notice that the Major League Soccer is the most in head coaches of colour.


I wonder why all of them say 2020 except for the Women’s National Basketball Association. I wonder why coaches’ are less likely to be people of colour.
ace_sentences: Both basketball associations have the most players of colour.
Major League Baseball lacks players of colour.
Major League Baseball lacks head coaches of colour.
Major League Soccer has the most head coaches of colour.
All of them say 2020 except for the Women’s National Basketball Association.
I wonder why all of them say 2020 except for the Women’s National Basketball Association.
Head coaches are less likely to be people of colour.
I wonder why head coaches are less likely to be people of colour.
